content: We all know that problem we face last year, but never lose hope when we face hardship in life always stay positive, turn negative into positive energy every time, as we face a new year I hope everyone brought a lot of patience, knowledge and experience from the last year, may we make the right decisions in trading, investing and anything that regarding cryptocurrency, may our minds always work and decides what is the right thing to do, may our past investment grew and makes some progress, let us share what we learn to other people so that every one is happy, and don't have to make wrong calls on what they do, I also hope that the newbies learn a lot from the pioneers and old members, since we share what we know and learn to others, and lastly may we not encounter, scams and hacks as we go along this year Happy New Year guys, wishing everyone to improve and reach our goals in this forum.
